name: Legend of Fishstick Quest Cat Adventures
name_original: Legend of Fishstick Quest Cat Adventures
description:
It's Ralph's birthday!
However Bruce the rabbit is up to no good.
Collect fishsticks to grow stronger and take on the evil rabbit so you can have cake!

Controls
A - Talk/Advance Test
S - Attack
Arrow Keys - Move

Made for the GBJAM8 Game Jam, was unwell for more than half of it so it's more on the short end. Keep in mind there are a few bugs but hope you can enjoy the game nonetheless :).
